api_list.name: Search for Cat Breeds by name
api_list.description: Search for a Breed by using part of it’s name as the ‘q’ query parameter.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Example : sib to search for Siberian , Ben for Bengal ... etc

api_list.name: List the Cat Breeds
api_list.description: The properties for each Breed will increase over time as more research is completed.
